message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today.  I think it would be incredibly useful for you. I'm asking for $20,000 for it.  What do you think?
Thank you for considering my offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can only justify spending up to $12,000 for it. Would you be open to discussing this further?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product's value to me is quite high.  Could you meet me halfway at $16,000?
I appreciate your response, Alice. While I understand the value you place on the product, I am still unable to meet at $16,000. I am willing to go up to $14,000. Would you consider this offer?
